meanings.sent1: The teacher's voice was audible even at the back of the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock made an audible noise to wake me up in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring was so audible that it sounded like a tiny motor running.
meanings.sent4: The thunder was so audible that it felt like the sky was growling.
meanings.sent5: The singer's beautiful voice was so audible that it brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: A sound that can be heard
meanings.sent1: The movie had many audibles that added to the suspense.
meanings.sent2: The sudden audible of a door slamming made me jump.
meanings.sent3: The loud audibles of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The audible of waves crashing against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The eerie audible of footsteps in the dark hallway sent shivers down my spine.
